sentence.Network_en: Early interventions are of great importance to children with congenital sensorineural deafness.

sentence.Network_en: Result: The ratio of various complications in their proper order is: otorrhea , 10.1 % ; tympanosclerosis, 8 %; perforations, 3.4 %; tinnitus , 1.7 %; sensorineural hearing loss, 0.8 %.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果: 术后并发症的发生率依次为耳漏( 10.1% ), 鼓室硬化症(8%), 鼓膜穿孔(3.4%)、 耳鸣 (1.7%), 感音神经性聋(0.8%).

sentence.Network_en: Sudden sensorineural hearing loss ( SSHL ) is emergency case in Otorhinolaryngology with unclear aetiology and autotherapy.

感觉神经性听力丧失(sensorineural hearing loss): 气导,骨导的听力丧失阀值很接近(程度相同); 即病变在耳蜗(感觉性,sensory)或神.
感音性听力损失(sensorineural hearing loss)：听觉讯息由耳蜗至听觉皮质的传导过程有缺陷。
